    Gaza with Aya Alghazzawi & Issam Adwan

    18 May 2021

    Two voices from Gaza. The first of two episodes on Palestine this week with teacher and BDS activist Aya Alghazzawi and journalist Issam Adwan, project manager for We Are Not Numbers.

    DONATE NOW to the Palestinian people: We Are Not Numbers wearenotnumbers.org/home/donate Multiple organizations: muftah.org/organizations-working-in-palestine-that-need-your-support/#.YKQaGZNKhpT

    Topics: Palestine
    Guests: Aya Alghazzawi Issam Adwan
